content.query:
with trips_data as (select * from OPENROWSET(
        bulk 'raw/trip_data_green_delta',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
        format = 'Delta') as delta_trips_data ), zones_data as(select * from OPENROWSET(
        bulk 'raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
        format = 'csv',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE) as csv_zonesdata ), paymenttype_data as(select payment_type, payment_type_desc from 
    OPENROWSET(
        bulk 'raw/payment_type.json',
         DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
        format = 'csv',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b'

    )with(
        jsondata NVARCHAR(MAX)
    ) 
    as json_paymenttype_data
    CROSS APPLY openjson(jsondata) with (payment_type SMALLINT , payment_type_desc VARCHAR(15)))

select 
zones_data.Borough, count(*) as total_trip,
COUNT(CASE when paymenttype_data.payment_type_desc = 'Credit card' then trips_data.VendorID end) as card_trips,
COUNT(CASE when paymenttype_data.payment_type_desc = 'cash' then trips_data.VendorID end) as cash_trips,
cast((sum(CASE when paymenttype_data.payment_type_desc = 'cash' then 1 else 0 end)/
cast(count(trips_data.VendorID)as decimal))
*100 as decimal(5,2))as cash_trips_percentage,
cast((sum(CASE when paymenttype_data.payment_type_desc = 'Credit card' then 1 else 0 end)/
cast(count(trips_data.VendorID)as decimal))
*100 as decimal(5,2))as card_trips_percentage

from trips_data 
left join zones_data on trips_data.PULocationID = zones_data.LocationID 
left join paymenttype_data on trips_data.payment_type = paymenttype_data.payment_type 

group by zones_data.Borough 
order by count(*);
